name: Quick Sell
description: A used mobile sell web application built with React, Authentication, User Roll and Mongodb
de_p_1: A user without login , only see home page and blogs page. when user click advertise section or brand section alart he not login, and rediract login page. When login any on, before success login check user type , and show spacific item for this user can do.
de_p_2: seller add a product , than show my product, there two btn, one advertise(when book any buyer it show booked, and when complete paying, show PAid), and delete option.first-letter:
de_p_3: seller see his all buyer also, and product advertise, when user, book any product , show this product booked, and hide from advertise page, and when payment complete, hide from site.
de_p_4: Admin control all user, all seller , verify seller, delete product, delete advertise product, and any user and seller oslo.
de_p_5: if user delete a seller, also delete this buyer all docoment from site and data base.

name: Excellent Photographer
description: A Excellent Phothgraphy site used for hire Photographer built with React, Authentication, and Mongodb
de_p_1: On this site related of photography profession. On home page, A navBar(Home,Services,Blogs, login, register {when login}->signout,Add Services,My Review )
de_p_2: On home page , show service with limit 3, and see all btn click go to the services page and show all services (go to '/services' route) when click details btn, go to '/services/:id' route and show details and reviews.
de_p_3: on review section , see all review all the user, but if user went to comment a review , its only for login users, add services is privete route, any user can add a service with the all information.
de_p_4: myreview route will show all review by comment the user, it only for login user, and only show his won review.
de_p_5: there have two btn, update and delete. if user click delete btn, comment will delete from database, show delete from any where. if user went to update click on update btn.

name: Sadhin Courses
description: A online base learning platform built with React, Authentication and Mongodb
de_p_1: on course page , there are six card for course. and left side nav ca show the name of the course. when click on details btn, or course name go to the details page
de_p_2: in details page , there have to btn, when click get premium access , then check user canbe login or no, if user login go to check out page, or not to go to the login page
de_p_3: on my site have 3 type of login system, 1. email and password, 2. google, 3. gitgub. when user successfully login go to the dastination , (check out page).
de_p_4: when user click check out. then show a toast for comfirm and download a pdf of user and course details.
de_p_5: home page right side have a icon, when user are not login, and there click show login and register btn, and whem login show frofile and log btn
